column4: oh and i write shell scripts   i have added almost 12k commands to my system.
have you notice that irc with the root account is danger because you can actually exploit you're system?
crack it if you can.   you wont get far here :)))
if it weren't for the effort of typing passwd root   to set a password i would offer to let you ssh in as root

of course iptables   but that's not why i'm not concerned about my account,   i'm not concerned about "root" because i made that account specally to irc with,  it's the most restricted account on the whole system.
a few other odd things one would find when accessing this "root" account  are that i don't have partitions, don't use swap, and that the whole system is "nosuid".    just an fyi.
can you tell me what thi's guy script does?

yes i can give you a general overview of what that script does.    it basicly installs a lot of extra packages and some non-packaged stuff that it has to compile on-site,   it also deletes most of the build dirs so one can not clenly remove what was just built and installed.
oh you mean lame   hehhe yes
basicly i wouldn't run anything like that until i had gone over every command in it and checked out all the non-packaged stuff
